channel.title: Error connecting to server [pi] sorry if i double posted
channel.description:
I'm really getting pissed off with this "error conecting to server" message i'm getting when i try to connect to my OWN server. Tried connecting with my webclients (which were working fine till a couple of days ago) nothing, tried connecting with my .bat client and .jar client. nothing, tried connecting with hamachi webclient. nothing.
I haven't touched any of the files and even if i did it wouldn't effect my jar client, would it? i have tried connecting to localhost but i'm not sure if i've done it right. is there anything wrong with the server lines below? [code] if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals("127.0.0.1") || 1 == 1/*to remove*/) {[/code]
[code] server = "127.0.0.1"[/code]
[code]public static String server = "127.0.0.1";[/code]
sorry if i double posted, my connection always times out when i post so i don't know if i've posted or not

item.title: Error connecting to server [pi] sorry if i double posted
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

Look at my quotes in first post
That’s what I put in my client.java

item.title: Error connecting to server [pi] sorry if i double posted
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

iBunnie:

are you trying to use your own no-ip adress? XD The owners of server has to use a custom client. They just have to put the ip as ‘127.0.0.1’ and it will work. XD

Dude I’m not retarded I’m just a noob.
My server has worked a million times before on hamachi and on my no-ip.
Others can connect just me that can’t.
And ultimatepkvillage, I will try what u said when I get on my laptop later

Read full topic
